CustomField.formula: IF(INCLUDES(Type__c, "Kick-off Meeting - Date Confirmed"), "Kick-off Meeting - Date Confirmed" + BR(), NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Type__c, "Kick-off Meeting - Invite Accepted"), "Kick-off Meeting - Invite Accepted" + BR(), NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Type__c, "Client Confirmed Resources and Materials"), "Client Confirmed Resources and Materials" + BR(), NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Type__c, "Writer Offer"), "Writer Offer" + BR(), NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Type__c, "Writer Agreement"), "Writer Agreement" + BR(), NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Type__c, "Interview Request"), "Interview Request" + BR(), NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Type__c, "Interview Commitment"), "Interview Commitment" + BR(), NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Type__c, "Interview Invitation Accepted"), "Interview Invitation Accepted" + BR(), NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Type__c, "Outline - Changes"), "Outline - Changes" + BR(), NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Type__c, "Outline - Approval"), "Outline - Approval" + BR(), NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Type__c, "Quote Approval "), "Quote Approval " + BR(), NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Type__c, "Consent & Release Form"), "Consent & Release Form" + BR(), NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Type__c, "Design PDF - Revisions"), "Design PDF - Revisions" + BR(), NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Type__c, "Design PDF - Approval"), "Design PDF - Approval" + BR(), NULL) + IF(INCLUDES(Type__c, "Other"), "Other" + BR(), NULL)
CustomField.label: Type
